mapper.select: select t.members_name as membersName, s.staff_name as staffName, k.create_date as createDate, k.dueto_date as duetoDate, p.p_name as pName from t_mem t ,t_staff s,t_mempack k,t_pa p where s.id=k.uid and k.mid=t.members_id and t.members_id=p.members_id limit #{start} ,#{rows}
select t.members_Id as membersId, t.members_Name as membersName from t_mem t
select t.id as id, t.mid as mid, t.uid as uid, t.create_date AS createDate, t.dueto_date as duetoDate from t_mempack t where t.uid=#{uid}
